title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. III, pt. 105 - DESIGNATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF DRUG TREATMENT CAMPUSES (REPEALED)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. III, pt. 105 - DESIGNATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF DRUG TREATMENT CAMPUSES (REPEALED)

State Regulations
§ 105.1 - Willard Drug Treatment Campus (Repealed)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. III, pt. 105

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§2, 70

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
